snippet.title: Mario vs. Donkey Kong - Nintendo Direct 9.14.2023
snippet.description:
Mario vs. Donkey Kong is releasing for Nintendo Switch on February 16, 2024! Pre-order today: https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/mario-vs-donkey-kong-switch/

The rivalry that heated up on the Game Boy Advance system reignites in this updated version of the game. With his eyes on the prize, Donkey Kong has stolen all the Mini-Mario toys from the factory and it's up to Mario to rescue them! In this updated version of the game, you can play with a friend in local co-op.

#MarioDonkeyKong #NintendoSwitch #NintendoDirect

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com/

Like Nintendo on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Nintendo
